messages.message: Are there plans to make it easier to move Solution Accelerator/Marketplace Apps from one environment to another? It's a bit cumbersome to find which models and versions are used by a flow and then have to import those also. I'm getting used to the process but curious if there has been any discussion on improving this experience?

Hi John, we are working on an ability to be able to move solutions between two Instabase environments. This initiative may not cover entirety of your use case. Happy to discuss further to see how we can help
